ol.li:
Change the directory to the LDK working area ./ldk_r0.9_cdns/training/setup/cadence/ldk, and then source the sourceme file if this is the first time launching the Cadence* tools from the shell you are working in.
Prior to invoking Cadence Virtuoso*, ensure the Cadence Virtuoso* Application Library Environment (VALE) Framework is available according to the local VALE setup installation and modified accordingly in the <ldk>.cdsinit file (Figure 4). Figure 5: CDS_MVS_IMF_CM Shell Variable

Launch Cadence Virtuoso*:virtuoso &
The Command Interpreter Window (CIW) and Library Manager display.

li.p: Load the autoLib utility in the CIW entry field using command shown in Figure 5 (you can copy/paste the following string):loadContext("./files/64bit/autoLib.cxt")

ol.li: While in the CIW, enter Bindkey <F10> to display the Auto Lib View Generation (autoLib) utility (Section 2.7.2).
